p: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds on the same target.
q: Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.  Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.
w: Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.  Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
e: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
r: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.
